description: This file defines API endpoints for a FastAPI-based web application managing products, alerts, and jobs related to pricing data. It contains route definitions for creating, retrieving, updating, deleting products, as well as listing alerts and fetching latest prices via a scheduled job.

classes.name: APIRouter
classes.description: FastAPI router class used to organize related endpoints for products, alerts, and jobs

classes.name: PricingService
classes.description: Service class used for fetching latest prices for products

methods.name: List[schemas.ProductRead] list_products(db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles GET request to list all tracked products with nested price history and alerts.

methods.name: schemas.ProductRead create_product(payload: schemas.ProductCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles POST request to create a new product with optional initial price.

methods.name: models.Product _get_product_or_404(db: Session, product_id: int)
methods.description: Helper function to retrieve a product by ID or raise 404 if not found.

methods.name: schemas.ProductRead get_product( product_id: int = Path(..., description="Product ID"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Handles GET request to retrieve a specific product by ID.

methods.name: schemas.ProductRead update_product_put( product_id: int = Path(..., description="Product ID"), payload: schemas.ProductUpdate = Body(...), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Handles PUT request to update a product by replacing specified fields.

methods.name: schemas.ProductRead update_product_patch( product_id: int = Path(..., description="Product ID"), payload: schemas.ProductUpdate = Body(...), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Handles PATCH request to partially update a product.

methods.name: None delete_product( product_id: int = Path(..., description="Product ID"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Handles DELETE request to remove a product and associated data.

methods.name: List[schemas.PriceHistoryRead] get_price_history( product_id: int = Path(..., description="Product ID"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Handles GET request to retrieve price history for a product.

methods.name: List[schemas.AlertRead] list_alerts(db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles GET request to list all alerts.

methods.name: dict fetch_latest_prices_job(db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Scheduled job endpoint to fetch latest prices for all products, update records, and create alerts if appropriate.

ctags.name: create_product
ctags.pattern: /^def create_product(payload: schemas.ProductCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> schemas.Pro/

ctags.name: delete_product
ctags.signature: ( product_id: int = Path(..., description="Product ID"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

ctags.name: get_price_history
ctags.signature: ( product_id: int = Path(..., description="Product ID"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

ctags.name: get_product
ctags.signature: ( product_id: int = Path(..., description="Product ID"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

ctags.name: update_product_patch
ctags.signature: ( product_id: int = Path(..., description="Product ID"), payload: schemas.ProductUpdate = Body(...), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

ctags.name: update_product_put
ctags.signature: ( product_id: int = Path(..., description="Product ID"), payload: schemas.ProductUpdate = Body(...), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
